    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game​(java.lang.String brdPath,
            java.lang.String prgPath)
     throws InvalidBoardException
        This Constructor attempts to load a Game from a file this constructor is used for a TUI
        Parameters:
        brdPath - is a file that sets the representation of the board
        prgPath - is a file that holds the Player names and their moves
        Throws:
        InvalidBoardException - in case of invalid values

      • Game

     throws InvalidBoardException
        Allows for game to the constructed from a custom user inputs through gui
        Parameters:
        playersHM - {"Alice": ("FLFWF","RFWFL")} player stats
        board - [...., ....., ....., .....]
        Throws:
        InvalidBoardException - board is miss aligned

    • Method Detail

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        true = game still has steps remaining there is no winner yet or more instructions are available
        false = game has ended and there is a winner or there no more instructions therefore a draw
        Returns:
        this.winner == null && !this.draw

      • step

        public void step()
        Runs game for one step
        Executes Player.step() for each player in correct order
        See Also:
        activateAllActions(), startIndex, winner

      • getWinner

        public Player getWinner()
        Player if winner else null
        Returns:
        gets winner
